goal.ch: 本課程介紹了使用主動和被動源的應用地震學的基本和高級概念。目標包括為學生提供關於如何使用地震波形進行資源研究的廣泛概述，以及減少自然災害。地震波形已被用於研究地震、颱風、降雨、風和滑坡的震源過程。地震波形也可用於研究地殼結構和岩土工程。預計學生將了解諸如地震波形預處理、正演建模和陣列分析等方法。
goal.en: This course presents fundamental and advanced concepts of applied seismology using both active and passive sources.  The objectives include providing students a broad overview of how to use seismic waveforms for resources research, in addition to natural hazard reductions.  Seismic waveforms have been used to study source processes of earthquakes, typhoons, raining, wind, and landslides.  Seismic waveforms can also be used to study crustal structures and for geotechnical purposes.  Students are expected to gain understanding of approaching such as seismic waveform preprocessing, forward modeling, and arrayed analyses.
